item.title: 得益于汽车业务和智能手机销售，小米第二季度收入大增 32
item.description: 中国小米公司周三公布第二季度营收增长 32%，主要得益于汽车业务部门带来的新收入来源，以及手机销售强劲的推动。【原文：China's Xiaomi Corp posted a 32% rise in second-quarter revenue on Wednesday, driven by new revenue streams from its auto business unit and boosted by strong sales of handsets.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，特斯拉将召回 9,000 多辆 Model X SUV
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，特斯拉正在召回 9,136 辆 Model X 运动型多功能车，原因是车顶上的一个饰件可能会分离，从而增加发生碰撞的风险。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said Tesla is recalling 9,136 Model X sports utility vehicles over a trim on the roof that could separate, increasing the risk of a crash.】

item.title: 中国机构称欧盟电动汽车关税草案缺乏客观性和公正性
item.description: 一家中国行业机构周三表示，欧盟对中国电动汽车（EV）的反补贴调查结论草案缺乏客观性和公正性。【原文：The European Union's draft findings from an anti-subsidy investigation into Chinese electric vehicles (EV) lack objectivity and fairness, a Chinese industry body said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要和非农就业数据修正前的期货市场停滞不前
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货基本持平，因为在美国就业数据初步修正和美联储上次政策会议纪要公布之前，投资者仍持观望态度。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were largely flat on Wednesday, as investors remained on the sidelines ahead of the preliminary revisions to U.S. payrolls data and the release of minutes from the Federal Reserve's last policy meeting.】

item.title: 中国上汽集团誓言在欧盟起草补贴调查结果后采取进一步措施
item.description: 在欧盟委员会公布对中国电动汽车的反补贴调查结论草案后，中国上汽集团周三表示，将进一步采取法律措施保护自身权益。【原文：China's SAIC Motor said on Wednesday it will take further legal measures to protect its rights and interests following the European Commission's draft findings from its anti-subsidy investigations into Chinese electric vehicles.】

item.title: 俄罗斯 Rostec 公司总裁建议对组装汽车进口采取保护措施
item.description: 俄罗斯大型企业 Rostec 的负责人谢尔盖-切梅佐夫（Sergei Chemezov）说，他很感谢中国汽车制造商填补了西方品牌退出造成的空白，但国家可以考虑对组装汽车采取保护措施。【原文：Sergei Chemezov, the head of Russia's vast Rostec corporation, said that he was grateful to Chinese automotive makers for filling the gap created by the exit of Western brands but that the state could consider protective measures on assembled cars.】

item.title: 中国对欧盟进口乳制品展开反补贴调查，以回击电动汽车关税
item.description: 周三，中国对从欧盟进口的乳制品展开反补贴调查，在布鲁塞尔发布对中国产电动汽车征收关税的修订决定草案一天后，中国与欧盟的紧张关系加剧。【原文：China opened an anti-subsidy probe into imported dairy products from the European Union on Wednesday, stepping up tension with the bloc a day after Brussels released its revised draft decision to impose tariffs on China-made electric vehicles.】

item.title: 欧洲股市交易平淡；基础资源大放异彩
item.description: 欧洲股市周三持平，投资者等待美联储 7 月份会议的纪要，以进一步判断决策者的情绪，而基础资源股则使股指保持上扬。【原文：European shares were flat on Wednesday as investors awaited the minutes of the Federal Reserve's July meeting to further gauge the mood of policymakers, while basic resources kept the index afloat.】

item.title: 智利 SQM 公司利润下滑 63%，预计锂价格将持续疲软
item.description: 全球第二大锂生产商智利 SQM 公司周三报告称，由于电池金属价格疲软，该公司季度利润下降了 63.2%，降幅高于预期。【原文：Chile's SQM , the world's second-largest lithium producer, reported a bigger-than-expected 63.2% slide in its quarterly profit on Wednesday due to weak prices of the battery metal, which it expects will continue for the rest of the year.】

item.title: 货币跌至历史最低点，缅甸家庭陷入困境
item.description: 缅甸货币的迅速贬值正在推高包括食品和药品在内的生活必需品的价格，使这个饱受内战和经济崩溃摧残的东南亚国家的普通家庭陷入困境。【原文：A rapid depreciation of Myanmar's currency is pushing up the prices of essentials, including food and medicine, crippling ordinary households in the Southeast Asian country wrecked by civil war and a crumbling economy.】

item.title: 瑞士推出即时支付，赶超欧洲
item.description: 瑞士公司和消费者现在可以进行即时电子支付，赶上了欧洲其他金融中心的步伐，在这些金融中心，超快速转账越来越受欢迎。【原文：Swiss companies and consumers are now able to make instant electronic payments, catching up with other European financial centres where the ultra-fast transfers are increasingly popular.】

item.title: 民主党人齐聚一堂，投资者评估哈里斯政府对市场的影响
item.description: 投资者正在努力应对卡马拉-哈里斯可能出任总统对市场的影响，这可能会通过提高税收给企业利润带来压力，同时对主要消费品造成压力，并促进太阳能的发展。【原文：Investors are grappling with the market implications of a possible Kamala Harris presidential administration, which could pressure corporate profits through higher taxes while weighing on consumer staples and boosting solar energy.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Stellantis 首席执行官将访问美国，制定扭转利润下滑的计划
item.description: 一位熟悉该计划的人士称，Stellantis 首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯将于本周访问底特律，他将在那里寻求制定一项战略，以修复这家欧洲汽车制造商陷入困境的北美业务，并安抚员工和投资者。【原文：Stellantis CEO Carlos Tavares will visit Detroit this week, where he will seek to develop a strategy to fix the European automaker's struggling North American operations and reassure employees and investors, a person familiar with the plans said.】

item.title: 香港交易所上半年利润下降 3%，第二季度业务回升
item.description: 香港交易所运营商表示，尽管由于第二季度市场收入回暖，交易低迷和上市活动减少导致上半年利润下降 3%，但该公司对今年的前景持谨慎乐观态度。【原文：Hong Kong's bourse operator said it's cautiously optimistic for the year despite a 3% drop in first-half profits on sluggish trading and subdued listing activities, as market revenue warmed up in the second quarter.】

item.title: 早间竞价反弹后的就业焦点
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 路透调查显示 57% 的经济学家认为日本央行将在年底前再次加息
item.description: 路透社周三公布的一项民意调查显示，半数以上的经济学家认为日本央行将在年底前再次加息，其中对加息月份有看法的经济学家倾向于在12月加息。【原文：The Bank of Japan will raise interest rates again by year-end, according to more than half the economists in a Reuters poll published on Wednesday, with those who had a view on which month leaning towards a December increase.】

item.title: 中国称欧盟对中国电动汽车征收关税的草案带来 "巨大风险和不确定性
item.description: 据中央电视台周三报道，中国汽车工业协会表示，坚决反对欧盟对中国产电动汽车征收高关税的最终草案。【原文：The China Association of Automobile Manufacturers said it firmly opposes a final draft from the European Union on high tariffs for Chinese made electric vehicles, CCTV reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 投资者放大美国就业和美联储的影响，股市失去动力
item.description: 周三亚洲股市下滑，原因是全球股市的强劲反弹暂停喘息，而债券收益率和美元在美国经济数据公布前下跌，政策制定者的讲话预计将提出降息的理由。【原文：Asian shares slipped on Wednesday as a stellar rebound in world stocks paused for breath, while bond yields and the dollar fell ahead of U.S. economic data and speeches from policymakers that are expected to make the case for interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 多米诺澳大利亚专营店暴跌 7%，因为高成本侵蚀了更大一部分利润
item.description: 总部位于澳大利亚的多米诺比萨企业有限公司（Domino's Pizza Enterprises Ltd）股价周三暴跌超过 7%，此前这家特许经营商表示 2025 财年开局不利，因为成本上升和消费者节俭影响了盈利能力。【原文：Shares in Australia-based Domino's Pizza Enterprises Ltd slumped more than 7% on Wednesday, after the franchise operator flagged a weak start to fiscal 2025, as rising costs and frugal consumers weighed on profitability.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行面临降息阻力的紧要关头
item.description: 澳大利亚中央银行在未来几周内将面临放松政策的巨大压力，因为政府为减轻生活成本而发放的补贴将消费者价格大幅拉低，即使核心通胀率仍顽固地保持在高位。【原文：Australia's central bank is set to come under intense pressure to ease policy in coming weeks as government giveaways to alleviate the cost of living pull consumer prices sharply lower, even as core inflation stays stubbornly sticky.】

item.title: 美元兑欧元触及今年最低点，交易员为就业数据和杰克逊霍尔会议做准备
item.description: 周三，美元兑欧元汇率跌至今年以来的最低点，原因是在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）于本周末发表讲话之前，交易员们正在为当天晚些时候可能对美国就业数据进行的关键性修正做准备。【原文：The dollar slipped to its lowest this year versus the euro on Wednesday as traders braced for potentially crucial revisions to U.S. payrolls data later in the day, ahead of a speech by Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell at the end of the week.】

item.title: 美国原油库存增加，中东紧张局势缓解，油价下跌
item.description: 周三，油价下滑，原因是估计美国原油库存膨胀，而且在调解人巡视中东地区之后，人们预期中东紧张局势正在缓和。【原文：Oil prices slipped on Wednesday on estimates showing swelling U.S. crude inventories and expectations that tensions in the Middle East were easing following a tour of the region by mediators.】

item.title: 日本 7 月出口增长不及预期，出口量再次下降
item.description: 周三的数据显示，日本 7 月份出口增速略低于预期，装运量跌幅扩大，这让人们对刚刚开始加快复苏步伐的日本经济前景产生了一些疑虑。【原文：Japan's exports rose at a slightly slower pace than expected in July and shipment volumes extended their declines, data showed on Wednesday, adding to some doubts about the outlook for an economy that has only just started to pick up the recovery pace.】

item.title: 多米尼加共和国成立国有矿业公司勘探稀土
item.description: 多米尼加共和国周二表示，将成立一家国有矿业公司，负责勘探和开采该国的主要矿产资源，包括稀土矿。【原文：The Dominican Republic on Tuesday said it will create a state mining firm to explore and exploit the nation's key mining resources, including rare earth minerals.】

item.title: 电动汽车初创企业 Rivian 的生产主管加入 Stellantis
item.description: 在吉普 SUV 和公羊皮卡制造商准备推出多款电池动力汽车之际，Rivian 的制造主管即将离开这家电动汽车初创公司，加入 Stellantis。【原文：Rivian's head of manufacturing is leaving the electric vehicle startup to join Stellantis at a time when the maker of Jeep SUVs and Ram pickups is preparing to launch a number of battery powered cars.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，沃尔玛寻求通过出售 JD.com 股份筹集最多 37.4 亿美元资金
item.description: 彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道称，美国零售商沃尔玛正寻求通过出售其在中国电子商务公司京东商城（JD.com）的股份来筹集高达 37.4 亿美元的资金。【原文：U.S. retailer Walmart is seeking to raise up to $3.74 billion by selling its stake in Chinese e-commerce firm JD.com , Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 早间竞价市场盘整，两次利率上调
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 美国法官驳回拜登政府对工人 "非竞争 "协议的禁令
item.description: 德克萨斯州的一名联邦法官周二禁止美国联邦贸易委员会的一项规定生效，该规定禁止工人签署不加入雇主竞争对手或开展竞争性业务的协议。【原文：A federal judge in Texas on Tuesday barred a U.S. Federal Trade Commission rule from taking effect that would ban agreements commonly signed by workers not to join their employers' rivals or launch competing businesses.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟发现公司承诺为内华达影城投资 85 亿美元，等待税收抵免批准
item.description: 华纳兄弟探索公司（Warner Bros Discovery）周二表示，如果内华达州提供承诺的税收优惠政策，该公司将斥资至少 85 亿美元在内华达州拉斯维加斯的新制片厂制作电影和电视节目。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery said on Tuesday it would spend at least $8.5 billion to produce movies and television shows at a new studio at Las Vegas in Nevada, if the state provides promised tax incentives.】

item.title: 加拿大准备应对铁路停运，卡车司机争相满足需求
item.description: 在加拿大准备应对可能打击从汽车到农业等行业的铁路货运停运之际，卡车运输业表示，它面临着无法满足的更高需求。【原文：As Canada braced for a freight rail stoppage that could hit industries ranging from autos to agriculture, the trucking sector said it faced higher demand it could not meet.】
